name: reclaim-the-realm
description: CSS compiler for the RtR system

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:pack
scripts.build:pack: fvtt package pack "classTechniques" --in "./packs/_source/classTechnique" && fvtt package pack "coreAbilities" --in "./packs/_source/coreAbilities" && fvtt package pack "equipment" --in "./packs/_source/equipment" && fvtt package pack "martial_maneuvers" --in "./packs/_source/martial_maneuvers" && fvtt package pack "npcs" --in "./packs/_source/npcs" && fvtt package pack "perks" --in "./packs/_source/perks" && fvtt package pack "spells" --in "./packs/_source/spells" && fvtt package pack "species" --in "./packs/_source/species" && fvtt package pack "classes" --in "./packs/_source/classes" && fvtt package pack "gm-tables" --in "./packs/_source/gm-tables" && fvtt package pack "player-tables" --in "./packs/_source/player-tables"
scripts.build:unpack: fvtt package unpack "classTechniques" --out "./packs/_source/classTechnique" && fvtt package unpack "coreAbilities" --out "./packs/_source/coreAbilities" && fvtt package unpack "equipment" --out "./packs/_source/equipment" && fvtt package unpack "martial_maneuvers" --out "./packs/_source/martial_maneuvers" && fvtt package unpack "npcs" --out "./packs/_source/npcs" && fvtt package unpack "perks" --out "./packs/_source/perks" && fvtt package unpack "spells" --out "./packs/_source/spells" && fvtt package unpack "species" --out "./packs/_source/species" && fvtt package unpack "classes" --out "./packs/_source/classes" && fvtt package unpack "gm-tables" --out "./packs/_source/gm-tables" && fvtt package unpack "player-tables" --out "./packs/_source/player-tables"
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:css && npm run build:pack

author: Asacolips
